t: Amazon Brand Registry: 6 Benefits Your Brand Needs | Pattern
s: Amazon Brand Registry does more than just polish your brand on Amazon, it provides additional tools and increased brand protection. ... As an ecommerce business on Amazon, protecting your brand from fraud needs to be one of your biggest priorities. From third-party sellers changing the name of your products to competitors using your brand name to sell their low-quality items, there’s a lot of things that can affect your brand if you’re not careful.That’s why online ...
